Claim Element: A method for processing digital images comprising:
Evidence: Samsung Galaxy S24 Technical Documentation, Section 3.2

Claim Element: receiving an input image from a sensor;
Product Feature: Camera ISP receives raw Bayer data from the CMOS sensor
Evidence: Teardown Report (iFixit, 2024) showing Sony IMX890 sensor connected to Qualcomm Spectra ISP

Claim Element: applying a noise reduction algorithm to the input image;
Product Feature: Temporal and spatial noise reduction in the ISP pipeline
Evidence: Patent: US 10,234,567 describing Qualcomm's AI-NR algorithm; SDK documentation

Claim Element: generating an enhanced output image based on the noise-reduced image;
Product Feature: HDR+ processing produces the final enhanced image
Evidence: Google Camera app documentation; comparison samples showing before/after enhancement

Claim Element: wherein the noise reduction algorithm uses a neural network trained on paired noisy/clean image data.
Product Feature: Qualcomm AI Engine runs a trained DNN model for denoising
